summary: This is an object returned from transaction() calls that represents the current transaction.

methods.name: abort
methods.summary: Aborts the transaction. This may throw an error if it fails. Of if the operation is asynchronous, it may return a promise that represents the eventual success or failure of the abort.

methods.name: commit
methods.summary: Commits the transaction. This may throw an error if it fails. Of if the operation is asynchronous, it may return a promise that represents the eventual success or failure of the commit.
